metadata.name: The Genesis Pass
metadata.description:
"The Crypto Abstract" is an crypto influencer and teacher. The Genesis Pass NFT serves as an all-access pass into Abstract's community. With over 150 members, the Inner Circle Discord has become a go-to place for everything alpha in the crypto sphere. The Genesis Pass is a must-have for the true crypto enthusiast. 

NFT Designed by Ray Rivera / @RAYR.art

Mint a Pass here: https://app.manifold.xyz/c/cryptoabstract

Discord Invite  
https://discord.gg/thecryptoabstract
